title: Sunset Sailing Cruise
timeLong: Live Music Cruises on Friday Nights Only
priceLong:
**$50 per person**

Live Music Cruises:** $60 per person **
body: The perfect way to spend your day in Santa Barbara. You'll experience a fun and exciting cruise while enjoying beautiful views of the coast and the channel islands. This 50' Catamaran offers 1400 square feet of deck space while the multi-hull construction makes her comfortable, stable & safe. You'll find plenty of room for you and a guest or a large party. On board you'll find a beer, wine and soda bar. Light snacks and restrooms are on hand for your convenience. Friday nights we offer live music cruises for a relaxing atmosphere.
